jobTransform.doc: Test digitization job transform with the most recent frozen DB Release

athena.doc: digitize full atlas with Hephaestus leakcheck
digitize full atlas, including LVL1 emulation, with L=3.5E33 25ns pileup using PileUpTools with Hephaestus leakcheck
